properties.address: 100 Universal City Plaza, Universal City, CA 91608
properties.Description: One of our favorite places in LA! The amusement park has rides and shows for the whole family � our favorites are Water World, the Studio Tour, The Mummy, and the Wizarding World of Harry Potter. Lots of shops and restaurants at City Walk if you�d rather save some money and not visit the park itself. (Pro tip: Save money on parking by parking at North Hollywood train station and riding one stop to Universal City)
